text:
Hi, I am trying to make a resources page. It must paginated, filterable and each resource has its own pages. Similar to the blog page.
Can anyone help me with this pls or provide links to some articles.
Is there a contact property that counts how many lists someone is included in?
Can you just make a resources blog?

I want to use HubSpot's blog listing method. Is there way to create a new listing page(like website, landing, blog pages are the three main. Can I create another similar to blog)?
I can write a template to list down and then add pagination, and depending on the page number, write some JavaScript to hide the remaining content that is not supposed to be on that specific page.
But I want to know if there is way(through HubSpot) to create a new listing page similar to the blog listing page.

Hi Sharad, you could spin up a <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-blog/cos-blog-how-do-i-create-a-cos-blog|new blog in your settings >area and assign the new blog a slug like `<http://yoursite.com/resources|yoursite.com/resources>`  and repurpose the blog in that fashion.

Another alternative approach would be to use <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/hubdb|HubDB> and dynamic pages to create your resource listing.
Hey what's up all, just joined up. Happy to be here!

Anyone have an idea why HubSpot is not tracking all pageviews? I understand taht HubSpot and Google Analytics will not track 100%, but HubSpot is showing a major decline in our blogs traffic but Google Analytics is showing the opposite. Here is the blog I am referring to: <https://www.smartriskcontrol.com/blog>
